transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji mujhe IndiaMART export ki lead show nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Sorry sir, aawaz aapki thodi si kat rahi thi. Hanji bataiye.
Customer: [inaudible] hai na.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Export ki lead show nahi ho rahi hai.
Executive: Kiski lead?
Customer: Export ki. Foreign countries ki.
Executive: Export lead?
Customer: Han.
Executive: Han to sir export ki lead kaise aapke paas show hongi? Abhi aapka export package thodi na hai.
Customer: Pehle bhi lead to show hoti hai na. Maine abhi ek lead li thi parso.
Executive: Han, abhi aapne purchase kari thi kal hi kari hai shayad. Nahi parso kari hai.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Han to aap kahi export nahi karte hai sir?
Customer: Han.
Executive: Export hi karta hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Aapka IC verified bhi nahi hai abhi.
Customer: Nahi wo nahi karwa rakha hai. Wo bhi kisi aur form se karta hu.
Executive: Achcha wo kisi aur form se kar rahe ho?
Customer: Han.
Executive: Ek minute, main aapki baari check karti hu.
Executive: To abhi ye jo aap domestic lead isme consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek minute. Wo domestic lead abhi aapke use ke liye nahi hai. Mujhe export lead hi chahiye.
Customer: Sirf aapko export lead chahiye?
Customer: Han, ye domestic me kuch nahi hai idhar kuch.
Executive: To sir uske liye main aapko batati hu uske liye to hamara aapko export plan lena padega kyuki uske baad hi aapki visibility aur listing hogi export level pe. Then aapke paas portal pe maximum leads export show hongi. Abhi to aapka ek domestic package hai.
Customer: Abhi show honi chahiye na. Main to bhai kar hi raha hu waise bhi.
Executive: Sir aise kaise? Dekhiye ye to hamari recommended leads hai jo aapke portal pe show ho rahi hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi ki hum aapko nahi dikha rahe hai. Abhi aapko dekhiye dikh rahi hai Norway ki bhi dikh rahi hai. US ki bhi lead dikh rahi hai, USA ki bhi dikh rahi hai, right?
Executive: Nepal ki bhi dikh rahi hai. Ye char leads abhi aapko dikh rahi hongi. But what if ki agar aapki ek listing hogi jaise ki maan lijiye abhi aapne IndiaMART se koi package nahi liya hota ek aap free list chala rahe hote to un leads me aur abhi aap ek paid client ho un leads me kafi difference hota hai. In the same way abhi jo hum aapko export ke lead sirf showcase kar rahe hain jinko buy karne ke liye aapko payment karni hoti per lead cost to wahi agar aapke paas zyada tar aap ek visibility hogi export level pe to aapko zyada tar leads export ki show hongi. Waha pe aap apna consumption pattern set kar sakte ho.
Executive: Agar aapka plan hai ki aap export me deal karo sir to aap kyu apna time sirf waste kare ki at least aap apna export me dekhiye.
Customer: Local market ke jese aisi lead aaye to mere to nuksan ho jaye na.
Executive: Aur jaise ki leads bhi available hai pebble stone ki agar main baat karu IndiaMART lead bhi generate kar raha hai.
Customer: Wo to.
Executive: To aisa nahi hai ki aap han aisa nahi hai ki hamare paas export ki leads available nahi hai. Export ki leads available hai but ek listing bhi matter karti hai sir agar aap export package lete ho to aapki listing jo hai across 100 plus countries hoti hai. To un countries se aapke paas requirements direct inquiries bhi aati hai aur leads bhi aapke portal pe show hoti hai. Ye aapke export ka benefit hota hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: [inaudible] me jarurat hogi.
Executive: Sir kyu nahi hogi? Aapke paas jo abhi aap paid supplier ho to abhi jo leads aapke paas show ho rahi thi kya wo pehle show ho rahi thi? Nahi ho rahi hongi na sir.
Customer: Ho rahi thi.
Executive: Nahi ho rahi hongi sir mujhe pata hai main bhi itne time se IndiaMART pe working hu mere paas bhi number of clients hai. Aur main isiliye aapko guide kar rahi hu I am not saying ki aap turant karao but main aapko suggest kar rahi hu ek ek lead jab purchase karoge wo aapke liye costly hai. Aap 700 deke ek ek lead purchase karoge.
Customer: Problem nahi hai na costly aa rahi hai to mere ko koi problem nahi hai mujhe to lead fitting chahiye.
Executive: But sir wahi jo leads aapko dikhengi na sir wo usi pe hi aapko fir kaam karna padega. Main aapko force nahi kar rahi hu but hum aapko export ki leads kuch extra nahi de payenge.
Executive: But agar aap export package lete hai to aapke portal pe export ki leads aapko showcase hoti hai aur unki ek listing hoti hai ek visibility pattern show hota hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Han to iske regardingly sir aapko waha pe aapki waha pe ek listing aur ek visibility ke sath sath aapka waha pe [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Export leads not showing on IndiaMART portal.

- Wants export leads, not domestic.



Resolution:

- Explained export plan needed for export leads.

- Mentioned current domestic package limitations.

- Highlighted benefits of export package for visibility.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- export, leads, package, listing, visibility
